name: milan patel
text: Really like the theming and branding here. It's the little things that make all the difference. Such as using Godzilla to represent their pacific rim pizza. Much appreciated. Also I like how they have dishes unique to each location. Food ‚Ä¶More

name: Shannon Winton
text:
Enjoyed the decor this MELLOW MUSHROOM had & I order 4 menu items. My excellent waitress named "Bay" helped me with xhoices and answered my questions.
The Meatball Trio appetizer, the Mushroom Soup, Enlightened Spinach Salad & the Brushetta & ALL were Delicious

name: Amy Kibbey
text: We had a great dinner tonight.  The pizza was served fresh.  The beer was great!  We felt very safe with all their Covid precautions.

name: Caleb Abbott
text: Had a great experience today, August 12, 2020. The food was delicious and our waiter, Jack, did an amazing job. He kept our drinks full, and took great care of use and when we asked him for suggestions on what to order he was very helpful. ‚Ä¶More

name: Goodloe Winters
text:
Don't walk through the front door....... because it's the exit, enter from the left side. It's a nice place, I ordered the mushroom pizza, it was really good.
Everyone else in the group ordered calzones, which they all liked.

name: Christina Chew
text: Super friendly and efficient staff and everything was delicious! We genuinely enjoyed our visit! A must-stop!

name: Paulette Risher
text: As we step out into the light after two months of quarantine, it is a joy to be able to enjoy eating out.  Tonight I had a great meal at the Mellow Mushroom in Jones Valley.  They were organized, welcoming, and careful.  Their patio has such a nice view.  What a blessing.  Thank you!

name: Jeff Reynard
text: We have really enjoyed mellow mushroom it is probably the best pizza that we have had in Huntsville. The time we ate in the restaurant the service was great. in general we tend to do pick up which has always worked well for us.

name: Samar Misra
text: Love this Mellow Mushroom in Huntsville!  Katrina is one of the workers that stands out with amazing customer service and energy and I love many others there too. Bless their hearts!

name: Wendy Fossett
text: Delicious as always! 3 stars because they would only let us have 1 menu! I mean really! How difficult is it to wipe a second menu? So it took twice as long to decide on what scrumptious food to get - one person, then the other person. 1 menu per table, no matter how many people.

name: John Askew
text: Great atmosphere. Would enjoy if the wait staff knew more about the famous beer selections. Often underage or don't drink.

name: Brad Hall
text: Excellent hospitality. Pizza is good (not astounding)  and there are lots of options available. Fun place.

name: Michelle Whetstone
text: Awesome food with awesome service.  Thought we were going to have a large group but turned out to be a smaller and they still were awesome!

name: Jennifer Strange
text: I have always loved Mello Mushroom,  no matter the location. Whether on vacation or visiting out of town, I will stop and eat. Covid has changed alot, but customer service shouldn't be affected, If at all, not negatively.  We were seated ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Midkiff
text: Awesome service!  Great drinks and pizza

name: Jacob Calvert
text: Never a bad experience here. The pizza, calzones, and apps are always tasty and timely.

name: montrealer90
text: Love the food. They have few vegan options and customer services is excellent!!

name: Jonathon Scott
text: It was actually my first visit to Mellow Mushroom. The pizza was amazing, the staff was as well.

name: Nancylee_planning
text: Our server was wonderful! Had a great time!

name: Darren Abbott
text: Good, shaded outdoor seating.  Great pizza.

name: Carla Sloke
text: No posting on door, menus or when we came in that they were out of gluten-free pizza crusts. If this is a speciality offered and they are out, it should be noted.

name: Nate Johnson
text: I am a mellow mushroom fan for life now! I recently found out that I couldn't eat cheese anymore which was a huge bummer because I have been eating cheese my entire life so pizza was no longer a option or so I thought... With mellow ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy Williams
text: One of the cleanest and most consistent restaurants in Huntsville. The food is always great. The servers and bar tenders treat you like family. You always see the managers out working and it shows in the attention to detail. One of my favorite chains in Huntsville.

name: True southern Accent
text: We ate at this location with family. The food and service was great. We will be back.

name: Anna Pung
text: This is one of my go-to places! Never have a bad meal and consistently have good service. Good beer selection too. We love the local favorites on the menu, but what happened to the loaded baked potato pizza? And the mints? Bring them back!!

name: ChrisandKelley Barber
text: Patio dining, food was excellent as always.

name: Brian Trotter
text: It's Mellow Mushroom. What else do you need to know? Some of the best pizza around and consistent quality. Decent craft beer selection. My kids enjoy the bocce ball outside.

name: nathaniel pierce
text: Mellow mushroom is usually great but this one is exceptional!

name: Scott Moss
text: I always love their pizza.

name: Kim Smith
text: Great food, super friendly hostesses and wait staff, fun place

name: Evan Alden
text: Good food and great service. Priced very well as well. I was happy all the way around.

name: Teresa Waters
text: Very good. They were very organized

name: Creative Living
text: My recommendation is the Mushroom club hoogie. I know majority eat here for their pizza but if you haven't had their mushroom club sandwich you are missing out. We drive from Guntersville AL just to get these. They are so so so delicious & tasty. Stacked inches high of goodness. Always amazing food & service!

name: Glen Adams
text: The lunch special of a salad and piece of pizza is a bargain.  Enough for 2 meals.

name: Ken Milligan
text: Great service, good and drink. What more could anyone want!

name: Jonathan
text: Meal was good burger was cooked just right and the spinach dip was delicious

name: Joseph McCreless
text: Mellow mushroom never disappoints. Great pizza with a fantastic crust. Excellent beer selection.

name: Beverly OFlaherty
text: Great food ! Wonderful, courteous customer service !

name: Allen Smith
text: Delicious food, hand tossed pizza!

name: Jaime E.
text: Gets the job done. Tastes great, but too pricey for a pizza.

name: Tiffany Michael
text: This is my first visit and definitely not my last! Best gluten free pizza ever!

name: catarina aniratac eriuqel
text: Service was good but they completely messed up my order. It was a relatively simple order. Veggie pizza with no green peppers. I received a pizza with ham, ground beef of some sort and other stuff I didn't want. 2 stars because this has happened every time I have eaten here.

name: Angel Perez
text: Mellow mushroom is actually one of the few establishments I frequent. Service is good n relatively good as far a timely manner. The on reason that I gave it the four stars is due to the waiting time to be seated. I understand there‚Äôs times ‚Ä¶More

name: Danny Gaskey
text: The best Pizza

name: Rob Smith
text: I got a half sub.   Not bad.   The pizza is incredible and more importantly there is a phenomenal draft beer selection!

name: Bruce Shoemake
text: Service was good however I ordered a cheese and mushroom calzone.  It was terrible.  It was  1" thick bread through most of it and was left with less than have that had filling and that was a mixture of partially melted cheese and thick ‚Ä¶More

name: Siersma K
text: They have always been very helpful and make sure my daughter has a great time.

name: Jessica Askew
text: Calzone take me away!

name: Beverly Lang
text: Called and ordered 3 pizzas and 2 of them were messed up.  I went over the order with the To Go person twice to make sure they were right.  Very disappointed - tried calling back to speak with a manager and after being put on hold no one ‚Ä¶More

name: Regan Christian
text: Love the pizza, wide selection of beers, good service, all around excellent. Get the pretzel bites with beer cheese dip.

name: Mathis Sneed
text: Wonderful atmosphere and great beer list.

name: Rich Sawyer
text: Good pizza. Not sure it's the best, but quality. Other items on the menu are good as well...great salad. Cool atmosphere, excellent beer menu.

name: Briana Hodgson
text: Great service. Friendly servers. Only thing is my calzone came out lukewarm.

name: Howard Beyer
text: We really love mellow mushroom. We travel way too much, 100 days a year, this is the best pizza we found.

name: Lee Smithson
text: Mighty Meaty calzone? Yeah, we good. üòé

name: sarah ggg
text:
Oh man where to start....
Our waitress was so friendly and when I asked for a beer recommendation she was able to give a good description of multiple options in my preferred stout range. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian L. Abbott, M.D.
text: great food. wonderful beer selection. relaxing atmosphere

name: Steve Moore
text: The absolute best pizza place in North Alabama. The beer selection is one of the best ever!

name: Terrie Fletcher
text: Awesome food and a great atmosphere!

name: DAN From the SOUTH
text: Excellent food and excellent service with a huge locally brewed beer selection!!! Not to mention the best oatmeal raisin cookies on earth!! And they use GrubSouth!!!!

name: Tom Frazier
text: Great pizza, salads and beer. Enjoyed spinach artichoke dip. Had fun on Trivia night.

name: Michael Lutz
text: Service and food was fantastic. My server, I believe her name is Keerstan, was very nice and reliable. Will go back and ask for her!

name: Mike Thomas
text: Good pizza and nice staff. A bit too Cali cool for me.

name: Kenneth Drinkard
text: First rate service and great pizza. Also enjoyed the trivia contest. Fun way to spend an evening with family

name: Sky T.
text: This place is incredible, great atmosphere, amazing food, Caylee and Andrea absolutely made it a memorable experience, definitely going to come back and enjoy this place again in the future. Come here for the best pizza and hoagies in Huntsville plain and simple.

name: christa watson
text: Delicious Pizza /salad. Great beer selection.

name: Brian
text: Amazing food drinks and service.

name: Miranda Thomason
text: Gluten free and vegan pizza. Tempeh hoagies and pretzel bites veganized.

name: christy Walley
text: Absolutely the best place for pizza.

name: David Brophy
text: Food and staff were great. Beer was good to. Lol

name: Sean Williams
text: Excellent pizza! Cool atmosphere.

name: LordCaptainBamboo
text: The pizza is great, but the beer cheese pretzels are the best thing ever. I love them.

name: Jake Howard
text: Great pizza and great service!

name: M
text: Love the pizza here

name: Courtney Hutcheson
text: Kids really enjoyed it. Service was good and very fast! Everything was fresh. Love the selection of beers they have.... will definitely visit again!

name: Ashley Lowder
text: Great service, great food, great time. I love the holy shiitake pie!

name: Leslie Grissom
text: Very delicious food, great service and very good staff.

name: Henry Lemley
text: Always the best pizza/calzone/ craft beer in any town.

name: Zeke H
text: Overpriced IMHO. I had the chef salad and while tasty it was rather thin on the other stuff that goes into a chef salad. My friends had the personal pizza and calzone and they said their's were very good.Had it not been for being with friends I never would have went to MM.

name: Daniel Cal
text: The pizza is still awesome. Reminds me if Atlanta in the 90s.

name: Gustavo Velasquez
text: Outstanding service (Allison, thank you). They have a great variety of draft beers as well as a plenty of options on local craft ones in their menu. Pizza is really good. Friendly place for social gathering with family, eating great food and drinking great beer while listening to good music.

name: Thank you
text: Service was Great and we got a great seat- we where here to.celebrate my Birthday and I bought my wife and two children ‚Ä¶More

name: Pat McNeill
text: Great food & service.

name: Larry Butler
text: The Mellow Mushroom has excellent pizza. I am sure other menu item are good as well, but we always enjoy the pizza.

name: Janet Morris
text: The pizza (I had the Holy Shiitake Pie) and garlic cheese bread are amazing. It's a bit loud when it's crowded, so it's hard to carry a conversation if you have a soft voice. The service is awesome, too.

name: Stephen Priest
text: Awesome food great service, clean restaurant

name: Chris Detrin
text: Best ameretto sour ive ever had pizza was good too.

name: Rick Winsatt
text: Great pizza.   Not much of a lunch rush.  Seems like the best time to be here

name: Dominique Hartmann
text: Very good! Nice service and fast.

name: Amy Underwood
text: Always a favorite! Great Food and Great service!

name: Edith Nugent
text: Good pizza and Good setvice. The bruschetta was good too.

name: B H
text: The food was pretty good not great. Family friendly atmosphere, clean, quick service, and the wait staff was very nice and helpful with all questions about items on the menu.

name: Jonathan
text:
The server Dezzy was amazing, the food was phenomenal, and my wife and I really enjoyed the atmosphere.
Pro tip get the holy Shitake pie w/ pepperoni and sausage added. Dezzy liked it with bacon.

name: Briana Garrison
text: The food was standard mellow mushroom fair and they did not disappoint

name: Matt Fowler
text: Really love Mellow. Great pizza of course but even better people. And beer. They have a legit local craft list that's amazing.

name: Doug Maddox
text: Food is some if the best in it's genre. Beer wasn't ice cold, but the prices are competitive.

name: Belinda Webber
text: Love this place. Good food and good service. Since the pizzas are made from scratch, make sure you're not in a hurry.

name: Tommy Moore
text: My girlfriend and I don't need the menu. I'm sure everything  is great. We get the same thing every time. We were going to try other menu selections, however we can't get past what is now our usual. 10 piece wings and a small house special. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Olson
text: Waitress was phenomenal! Pizza always fantastic! Showing support from Hampton Cove.

name: Heather Banholzer
text: Way over priced for what it is, our waitress never filled our drinks and did not come back to our table at all.

name: Matt Stephens
text: Great pizza and great service. Cayley was awesome, she made sure we were taken care of.

name: Heath Varmette
text: The pizza and calzones are awesome

name: Delilah Darden
text: The best pizza ever! Fresh ingredients with unique pizza options!

name: MCP
text: Expensive for pizza that is just okay. Won't be going back as papa John's tastes way better. We waited FOREVER for our app and the pizza was meh. The pretzel bites are okay but made from pizza dough. Won't be back. Service is terrible.

name: Lewis DeCarlo
text: A bit pricey for pizza but it was good though and service was adequate but nothing special.

name: CR H
text: Delicious food, quick service, and our server was easy to talk to, kind, and knew what we needed before we asked for it- she kept the drinks flowing. Her name was Caylee

name: Cody Bracewell
text: Love their calzones, wings, and beer selection.

name: Thelonious Jazzman
text: I really like Mellow Mushroom. I can't afford to eat there often, but the fare and selection are well worth the price. I chose because it was my Father's Day celebration with four of my 8 kids. I am vegan so I had mushroom soup and the ‚Ä¶More

name: Elise Goff
text: This is a pretty good mellow mushroom. It's big and open and has good mellow mushroom art. The service and food are good. Like all mellow mushrooms though it takes at least 30 minutes to get your pizza, longer if it's busy.  They have lots of craft brews on tap.

name: Britney King
text: Me and my family were very much looking forward to having lunch there today. Walked in and was seated and probably sat there for about 10-15 minutes and not one person came over to take our order. They were not busy. There were only a few ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael R
text: Great food and service

name: MaryBeth Martin
text: Great fresh ingredients,  Wonderful caring management. Try the house special pizza delicious!

name: Enrique Esquivel
text: Great pizza just very expensive My wifes favorite pizza place

name: Joshua Hearne
text: Pizza is always good as well as the service. It gets really busy starting around 5:30-6:00. They updated their menu awhile ago but you can still order the old pizzas.

name: Joshua Howland
text: It was very cold in there and I asked for them to turn it up a few degrees... no improvement for the entire hour and a half we spent there. The food took way too long to come out when the place was near empty and over half the people seated ‚Ä¶More

name: Nathan Coffman
text: Seated right away and pizza was cooked to perfection üëå Had a large half Maui Wowie & half loaded potato......... Hands down best pizza I've ever had. Personal fav is the Maui Wowie ‚Ä¶More

name: Levoy Morring
text: The food was delicious and the service phenomenal! Kagen was our server and he was the best we have ever had. That young man should be given a generous raise or some other type of compensation/reward for his dedication to his job and the people he serves. Well Done, Kagen!!!

name: Pama Lyons
text: Great food and fun trivia nights

name: Cierra Richards
text: The server was super friendly and patient.

name: George St Denis
text: Honestly, the 5 star rating I gave says it all !!! One of the greatest establishments I've been to in a long time !!

name: Stephanie N
text: Love their pizza! Do yourself a favor and get 1/2 Kosmic Karma and 1/2 Holy Shiitake Pie! You're welcome.

name: Jason Hulsey
text: Cold beer, great selection on tap, food is very tasty parking is plentiful overall great location I highly recommend this eatery.

name: Will Norton
text: Great food lots of good taps

name: James Kemp
text: Food is good. Staff is friendly. Calzone and drink was little pricey in my opinion.

name: Alan Williams
text: Great food and good service. I love the philosophers pie myself but anything you try is will be amazing!

name: Malcolm Gruber
text: Great pizza, great service.

name: Linda Powell
text: The pretzel bites with cheese beer were delicious!

name: Thomas Casey
text: Loved the meat pizza, it was cooked perfectly, fresh ingredients, fantastic sauce.

name: Chase Dyer
text: The waitress we had tonight was utterly terrible. She either didn't like her job or had a problem with humanity.  Food was the only saving grace for that experience

name: Joni Swaim
text: Great wings. Good sandwiches add well as pizza.

name: Michael Dunaway
text: Great food, bad service

name: Larry Thompson
text: Food was good service was friendly just a little slow

name: Allison Kennedy
text: Listen! I believe this food is going to be in heaven! üòÇ I was in Huntsville looking for a place to eat that's not in Nashville. Mellow Yellow was the only restaurant still open. I was undecided about what I wanted. I picked a Calzone! IT ‚Ä¶More

name: Paula Waldrep
text: Enjoy the pizza, cheese bread, and chef salad.  The pizza and cheese bread were hot and fresh.  The salad was very good loaded with a good variety of vegetables.  Highly recommend we eat here often

name: Chuck Snider
text: Good ingredients and flavor, crust was not crisp and lacking a distinct flavor that topped it off!

name: Morghann Allison
text: Good pizza but the staff can't handle big groups very well. Our church group has gone several times and I've been there with my family. Anything over four people really confuses the teenage wait staff and the orders get messed up. We'v just decided it's not the hassle to go if we have several people. Their pizza is great though

name: Sara Ray
text: The Mushroom never disappoints. Cool to watch the pizza chefs spinning dough, staff is laid back and super nice. Cool bar with lots of craft beers, many locally brewed. We've had salads, sandwiches, calzones, appetizers, and of course pizza; everything has always been perfect and yummy.

name: n williams
text: Hot food , cold beer . Great service....well  not now...order Not correct..kitchen not following order instructions..food Not hot...

name: brian hoyt
text: Wait staff was great. Manager was great. Food was great. Thanks for supporting Grissom Wrestling!

name: Dennis Mc
text: Always excellent food. Beer selection is top notch for anyone looking for craft beer or hard to find selections.

name: John Fishman
text: Good pizza fast service but employees way too casually dressed.

name: Darren Workman
text: Easily the best pizza around, havnt had better anywhere

name: Claudia Rhen
text: Try the FunkyQ BBQ Chicken pizza! The best ever!!!

name: Joed Baker
text: Great pizza and service!

name: Leslie Hargrave
text: Love it!

name: Kirsi LaRowe
text: They were awesome, food is great, beer selection is large

name: Brandon Buckman
text: Awsome we loved it

name: Loren Bangle
text: Best specialty pizza in town. So full of flavor

name: Arnold Collett
text: Always great food and service! Especially love the pretzel bites with beer cheese dip and the calzones!

name: James Hamilton
text: I come here for their specialty pizza's. Funky Q. Chicken is the best!!! Have visited several times and always a great experience. Pies are a little pricey, but very much worth it. Will visit again, highly recommended. Brother in Laws favorite pizza in town!

name: Jay Levasseur
text: I love this place! The food is excellent and they always ask if it's to your liking. If not, they will gladly fix or replace whatever may be wrong. The decor is very colorful and the tables and chairs are always clean! The service is ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Zimmerman
text: Nice environment, good food, friendly staff. But, not enough people waiting tables! 20 min for wine and water. Also, please get some uniformity in staff attire, it's hard to know if you're calling a waitress or just some bystander. And name tags! Also, write it down!

name: John Sandora
text: Great food from pizza to salads to burgers.

name: Ashlyn Shellito
text: The patio is dog friendly, the service is prompt, and the beer selection is great.

name: Jesse Hughes
text: Food and service is great!

name: Tina Benson
text: Great food quick friendly service

name: Cliff Mead
text: Great food and good service.

name: Zach Hill
text: Great service and amazing food!

name: Ryouji42
text: Great atmosphere, awesome people, and astounding drinks. 10/10 will be back soon.

name: Kirt Lowe
text: Pizza was great and a good selection of beer.

name: Harold S
text: Good trendy place for pizza

name: Clif Morgan
text: Great food. Great service. Great beer selection. Great service. Great group of regulars at the bar. Great service.

name: Steph M
text: Everyone was very aware of what a vegan order entails and it was refreshing to say "vegan" and not having to ask specifics about what everything is cooked with and telling them to omit a bunch of things. The employees are great. The food ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Clark
text: Great food. Friendly staff.

name: Preston Taylor
text: I apologize for the previous review! I accidentally reviewed the wrong location! It was Providence Place that caused my friend to have an ambulance called to her at the location. THIS LOCATION IS BY FAR THE BEST MELLOW MUSHROOM! Don‚Äôt go to Providence!

name: Walter Rice
text: Great food nice place

name: Anna Hawkins
text: Love, love their pizza. The 70s themed decor is fun.

name: Steve Klumb
text: Great pizza, beer selection and service.

name: roger thomas
text: Always a pleasure dining here!!

name: Andrea Presto
text: Such a friendly and helpful staff! Great food with amazing local menu! Love the Loaded Potato Pie!! Only suggestion to add egg to your menu!! Can't have a Cobb salad without eggs...

name: Carlos Montalvo
text: This place is whatever. I ordered a meatball sandwich which was good but it wasn't life changing. Mellow mushroom as a whole is kind of just overdone now. It probably doesn't help that I live close by and go there all the time.

name: Mark Hale
text: Great food and beer selection! We have had TJ as our server multiple times and he has always done an excellent job!

name: Jeff Miller
text: My family waited for 25 minutes and never had a server talk to us. We got up and left without ordering.

name: elizabeth brotzman
text: I've been to a few mellow mushrooms , this one is my favorite by far. Food came out quickly and tasted awesome. The staff were a little rushed but then again they are quite busy so don't expect to hold them up long with out getting a little attitude.

name: Tommy McGuire
text: I had the lunch special of a slice and a bowl of soup. Delicious. Also, a great beer selection.

name: Roxanne Perkins
text: The spinach salad is the best. The pretzels with the beer Cheese dip are out of this world (Made to order). The pizza is very very good. YUM! Craft beers.....I love this place.

name: Jim Macaulay
text: Delicious food server was extremely attentive highly recommend

name: Dean Isley
text: Excellent pizza and what a choice of beers!

name: Elizabeth Popkey
text: Hit during a busy hour so appetizer was a bit slow to arrive. Pizza and service was spot on though.

name: LInda marston
text: Enjoyed the magic mushroom soup and pizza very much

name: Debra Hart
text: Very good food

name: Anthony Still
text: They‚Äôve changed their recipes up in the last 12 months. The calzones, which used to be a fantastic deal, are made differently now. The pretzels are still great and the pizza is still pretty good, but it‚Äôs disappointing to see the calzones ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Lehman
text: They still hand toss their dough and their ingredient list is vast if not even obscure also has a bar with a wide variety of choices and beers

name: Lacy Berry
text: As always, amazing food and service. Genuinely interested in our needs. The Airstream is an awesome touch!

name: Lisa Morrow
text: Great people.. great food and beer!

name: John Harris
text: Good food. Mistake was made on our order. Manager jumped on it to fix A+

text: Great service, amazing pizza!

name: Chris Jones
text: Wonderful as always.

name: Nora Henry
text: Handicap parking is atrocious.  It would be better to put it in spots across from front door.

name: Cody Olivier
text: Great staff and great pizza.

name: Nicole Taylor
text: Good beer selection, very chill restaurant, good pizza choices, great staff, reasonably fast cook times considering it's pizza. And they have a decent kids menu, vegetarian options, and options for people who aren't wanting pizza.

name: Katie Sunshine
text: It's sometimes difficult to find a place to dine out when you're vegan. Oftentimes, restaurants have such limited menus that cater to your lifestyle. So, MM rocked my world with their plant-based options. Their tempeh is AMAZING...worth the ‚Ä¶More

name: Brett Bradshaw
text: Delicious food, wonderful service

name: Eric Marshall
text:
My first visit was with a friend. I can honestly say the House Pizza we ate was hands down the best pizza I've ever had.
Loved the huge selection of draft beers. ‚Ä¶More

name: Micah Chandler
text: Huntsville Mellow Mushroom is great every time I go there. Their employees are always pleasant and helpful and the food is so good.

name: Chris Duling
text: Always a solid pizza and the salads are good.  Usually good service.  Excellent beer selection.

name: Cj H
text: Seated easily right at 5 pm, no wait, good service and food.

name: Brad McClellan
text: It is perhaps the best pizza place in Huntsville for normal pizza.

name: Farryn Ferguson
text: It was awesome! My kids said they wanted to give this 10 stars! Great food, great service, and great atmosphere!!!

name: Todd Mason
text: Always good food and great service.

name: David Easterly
text: Excellent pizza and good selection of craft beer.

name: Mark Langworthy
text: To start, they have really great crust! Buttery, home-baked flavor. Yum!! The pies and salads are well made (to order) with fresh ingredients and are reasonably priced. We had a couple of different pies and both were excellent. The Prime ‚Ä¶More

name: Will Varmette
text: really nice at lunchtime. we had a nice long lunch and the staff was not rushing is out. we were there to support Rocket City Racing and will come back for dinner sometime.

name: Ashley Cason
text: My husband and I are regulars here and it is ALWAYS great. Ashlie and Jessica are the BEST bartenders! Every Saturday! The spinach and artichoke dip is to die for!

name: Robert Smith
text: Loud noisy tastier than some cold beer.

name: DeeAnn Kizziah
text: Love the staff here!  Friendly people, great friends and food!

name: Sharon Underwood
text: Great atmosphere, service very good & food was great!

name: Terry Nixon
text: Pizza seems to have changed a little from the last time we were here. More thin crust than before. Still fantastic toppings and beer selection best in the state.

name: Amanda Francis
text: Our waitress was awesome!! She was very friendly

name: tskinner01 OH
text: Excellent pizza.  Good atmosphere

name: alnanski
text: Good pizza and more. Great atmosphere, esp. for families. Good overall experience.

name: Mike Wellfare
text: Very good pizza, lots of choices. Happy service!

text: We had a very large group and they seemed very overwhelmed but the food was delicious!

name: Michael Sortino
text: Decent pizza, fairly priced!

name: Richard Bawcom
text: Had mushroom club hoagie.  One of the best hoagie I have ever had.  My wife had a gluten free pizza supreme which they loaded up well.  Service at bar was great.  See you next week.

name: Chad Taylor
text: Great food great atmosphere very friendly staff. You won't leave hungry

name: allen ivey

name: Jon Box

name: Chris Buckley
text: A bit expensive but Mellow Mushroom has a very fun atmosphere, a large variety of local and imported beer, and some amazing pizza.  The bar is great for a social and the dining room is great for the family.
